turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Assistant, I need some caffeine! Can you help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. I assume you want coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, Starbucks is probably best.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I can do that. I'm near a Starbucks right now. Do you know what you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much is a large cappuccino?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's 5.60.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hm. Ok. Can I get it with 2 percent?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm writing that down, yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Also, they have pretty good cookies, can you get me a cookie too?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what kind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The chocolate chip if they have it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's all I want for right now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. I'll put this on your Amex, if that's ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that will do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. It's about a 5 minute drive from here. I'll be to your office in about half an hour.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, Janice from down the hall just walked in - can you get her a regular small coffee as well?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I've added that to the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok great. See you in half an hour.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: See you then!
